General.Name: Dymatic Chemicals Inc
General.Description: Dymatic Chemicals,Inc. produces and markets textile auxiliaries and other fine chemicals in China. It offers pretreatment agents, dyeing auxiliaries, finishing agents, printing chemicals, specialty chemicals, cyclopentane, and enzyme products. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Foshan, China.

3.Name: Mr. Min Chong  Zhu
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
